block.refinedstorage.security_manager.he: Коли цей пристрій активний, він захищатиме мережу за замовчуванням і блокуватиме всі операції. Почніть додавати картки безпеки, щоб дозволити або заборонити певні операції для гравця.
gui.refinedstorage.controller.redstone_m: When this device is inactive, the storage network will not be able to use this device as an energy source.
gui.refinedstorage.storage.redstone_mode: When this device is inactive, the contained storage will no longer be accessible from within the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_help: The resources that may or may not be allowed in this storage, depending if the device is in allowlist or blocklist mode.
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_mode.e: Without any configured filters, no resources will be accepted in this storage.
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_mode.a: Only allow resources into this storage that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_mode.b: Disallow resources into this storage that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage.grid.synchronization_: Don't sync the search box text.
gui.refinedstorage.grid.pattern_in_inven: There is a pattern in your inventory for this resource.
gui.refinedstorage.grid.search_help.mod_: Use '@' to filter for resources from a specific mod
gui.refinedstorage.grid.search_help.tag_: Use '$' to filter for resources with a specific tag
gui.refinedstorage.grid.search_help.tool: Use '#' to filter for resources with a specific tooltip
gui.refinedstorage.crafting_grid.press_s: Утримуйте SHIFT + CTRL щоб показати лише предмети, що використовуються в рецепті.
gui.refinedstorage.pattern_grid.fuzzy_mo: Match the pattern inputs, ignoring components.
gui.refinedstorage.pattern_grid.processi: The resources that will be extracted from the storage network and will be inserted into the target inventory.
The resources that are expected to be returned to the storage network to deem the crafting task successful.
Click to configure amount and alternatives
gui.refinedstorage.search_box_auto_selec: Whether to auto-select the search box.
gui.refinedstorage.detector.mode.under: Emit redstone signal when under the amount
gui.refinedstorage.detector.mode.equal: Emit redstone signal when on the amount
gui.refinedstorage.detector.mode.above: Emit redstone signal when above the amount
gui.refinedstorage.detector.filter_help: The resource that should be detected in the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage.destructor.filter_hel: The blocks that may or may not be destroyed, depending if the device is in allowlist or blocklist mode.
gui.refinedstorage.destructor.filter_mod: Only allow blocks into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
Disallow blocks into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage.constructor.drop_item: Drop items instead of placing blocks
gui.refinedstorage.constructor.filter_he: The resources that should be placed from the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage.interface.filter_help: The resources that should be exported from the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage.exporter.filter_help: The resources that should be exported from the storage network.
gui.refinedstorage.importer.filter_help: The resources that may be imported from the target inventory.
Only allow resources into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
Disallow resources into the storage network that are configured in the filters.
This device will always be active, regardless of redstone signal.
gui.refinedstorage.redstone_mode.high.he: This device will only be active with a redstone signal.
gui.refinedstorage.redstone_mode.low.hel: Цей пристрій буде активний тільки без редстоун сигналу.
gui.refinedstorage.priority.storage_help: The order in which the storage network will insert or extract resources, highest-first. Click to modify the insert/extract priority. Press CTRL and click to modify the insert priority. Press ALT and click to modify the extract priority.
gui.refinedstorage.priority.autocrafter_: If multiple patterns exist for one resource, crafting tasks will prioritize the pattern in the autocrafter with the highest priority.
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.on.storage: Match the filters for the allowlist or blocklist, ignoring components.
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.on.extract: Match the filters when extracting from the storage network, ignoring components.
Match the filters when extracting from the source, ignoring components.
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.off.storag: Match the filters for the allowlist or blocklist exactly.
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.off.extrac: Match the filters when extracting from the storage network exactly.
Match the filters when extracting from the source exactly.
gui.refinedstorage.access_mode.insert_ex: The storage network will be able to insert or extract from this storage.
gui.refinedstorage.access_mode.insert.he: The storage network will only be able to insert into this storage. Contained resources will still be visible in a Grid.
gui.refinedstorage.access_mode.extract.h: The storage network will only be able to extract from this storage.
gui.refinedstorage.void_excess.help: When void excess mode is turned on and the storage is full, it will keep accepting resources but void them.
gui.refinedstorage.void_excess.allowlist: Void excess will only work when the storage is in allowlist mode.
gui.refinedstorage.filter_slot.shift_cli: Утримуйте Shift та клацніть, щоб очистити
gui.refinedstorage.regulator_upgrade.fil: The resource that should be regulated in the target.
gui.refinedstorage.security_manager.reds: When this device is inactive, the network will not be protected.
gui.refinedstorage.security_manager.fall: Slot for a Fallback Security Card.
gui.refinedstorage.security_manager.no_f: Add a Fallback Security Card to this slot to set permissions for every player without a Security Card. By default, all actions are denied.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.filter_help: Resources and patterns which should be exposed from the input network to the output network if the Relay isn't in pass-through mode.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_through.he: Whether this device should pass-through the entire input network signal as-is. Turn this off to selectively expose components to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_energy.hel: Whether this device should pass the energy buffer from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_storage.he: Whether this device should pass the storage from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_security.h: Whether this device should pass the security settings from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_autocrafti: Whether this device should pass the autocrafting patterns from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.filter_mode.all: Only expose resources from the input network to the output network that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.filter_mode.blo: Don't expose resources from the input network to the output network that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage.disk_interface.filter: Only allow resources into the storage disks or into the network that are configured in the filters.
Disallow resources into the storage disks or into the network that are configured in the filters.
The resources that may or may not be allowed transferred from or into the provided storage disks, depending if the device is in allowlist or blocklist mode.
gui.refinedstorage.disk_interface.transf: Insert the resources from the storage disks into the storage network.
Insert the resources from the storage network into the storage disks.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.lock_mode: Lock until redstone pulse is received
Lock until connected machine is empty
Lock until all outputs are received
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.visible_t: If this is enabled, you will be able to manage this autocrafter in the Autocrafter Manager.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.chained.h: This autocrafter is part of a chain.
This autocrafter is the head of the chain.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.not_chain: If another autocrafter is facing this one, they'll form a chain, allowing you to have more patterns going into a single machine.
Fills in the maximum number of this resource you can craft right now without starting the crafting process yet.
Break the cycle and try again.
The request is too large to handle!
Send a notification when the autocrafting task is finished.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter_manager.s: Search in pattern inputs, pattern outputs and autocrafter names.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter_manager.v: Show all autocrafters that are visible to the Autocrafter Manager.
Show all autocrafters that are not full yet.
item.refinedstorage.controller.help: Provides the storage network with energy. Multiple are allowed in a single storage network.
Provides the storage network with an infinite source of energy.
item.refinedstorage.disk_drive.help: Accepts storage disks to provide the storage network with storage space.
item.refinedstorage.disk_interface.help: Transfers resources between the storage network and provided storage disks.
item.refinedstorage.grid.help: Allows for interacting with the storage network.
item.refinedstorage.crafting_grid.help: Allows for interacting with the storage network, with crafting abilities.
item.refinedstorage.pattern_grid.help: Allows for the creation of Patterns for use in autocrafting.
item.refinedstorage.importer.help: Imports resources from an external source to the storage network.
item.refinedstorage.exporter.help: Exports resources from the storage network to an external destination.
item.refinedstorage.interface.help: Acts as the combination of an Importer and Exporter.
item.refinedstorage.external_storage.hel: Provides the storage network with storage from an external source.
item.refinedstorage.detector.help: Emits a redstone signal if the storage network contains a resource equal, above or under a given amount.
item.refinedstorage.constructor.help: Розміщує блоки з мережі сховища у світі.
item.refinedstorage.destructor.help: Знищує блоки зі світу та поміщає їх у мережу сховища.
item.refinedstorage.relay.help: Turn entire sections of a storage network on or off and create new branches of your network.
item.refinedstorage.autocrafter.help: Accepts patterns to store autocraftable resources.
item.refinedstorage.storage_disk.help: Stores %s items. When empty, use while holding to return the Storage Part. Upgradeable to a higher tier by combining with a Storage Part.
item.refinedstorage.storage_block.help: Stores %s items. When empty, use while holding to return the Storage Part and Machine Casing. Upgradeable to a higher tier by combining with a Storage Part.
item.refinedstorage.fluid_storage_disk.h: Stores %s buckets. When empty, use while holding to return the Fluid Storage Part. Upgradeable to a higher tier by combining with a Fluid Storage Part.
Stores %s buckets. When empty, use while holding to return the Fluid Storage Part and Machine Casing. Upgradeable to a higher tier by combining with a Fluid Storage Part.
item.refinedstorage.creative_fluid_stora: Stores an infinite amount of buckets.
Stores an infinite amount of buckets.
item.refinedstorage.wrench.help: Використовуйте для повороту блоків або утримуйте SHIFT і використовуйте для демонтажу блоків Refined Storage.
item.refinedstorage.speed_upgrade.help: Increases the operation speed of a storage network device.
item.refinedstorage.stack_upgrade.help: Increases the amount of resources that the storage network device handles per operation.
item.refinedstorage.silk_touch_upgrade.h: Діє як зачарування «Шовковий дотик» на кайлі.
item.refinedstorage.fortune_upgrade.help: Yields more resources when breaking a block. Acts like the Fortune enchantment on a pickaxe.
item.refinedstorage.regulator_upgrade.he: In an Exporter, will only export if the amount in the target is less than configured in the upgrade. In an Importer, will only import if the amount in the target is more than configured in the upgrade. Use item to configure.
item.refinedstorage.range_upgrade.help: Increases the range of the Wireless Transmitter.
item.refinedstorage.creative_range_upgra: Provides infinite range for the Wireless Transmitter. Does not work cross-dimensionally.
item.refinedstorage.wireless_transmitter: Provides wireless network access for items like the Wireless Grid. Multiple are allowed in an area for wider coverage.
item.refinedstorage.network_item.unbound: Use on any storage network device to bind.
item.refinedstorage.network_item.cannot_: There is more than one %s in your inventory.
There isn't any %s in your inventory.
item.refinedstorage.configuration_card.c: Cannot apply configuration card to different type of device. It is configured for %s.
item.refinedstorage.configuration_card.e: Use on a storage network device while crouching to copy its configuration and upgrades to the card.
item.refinedstorage.configuration_card.c: Use on the destination storage network device while crouching to transfer the configuration and upgrades. Use while crouching to clear.
item.refinedstorage.network_card.unbound: Use while crouching on a Network Receiver.
item.refinedstorage.network_card.bound_h: Insert into a Network Transmitter. Use while crouching to clear binding.
Transmits a network signal wirelessly. Needs a Network Card that is paired with a Network Receiver.
item.refinedstorage.network_receiver.hel: Receives a network signal wirelessly. Bind a Network Card to this block.
item.refinedstorage.cable.help: Connects storage network devices with each other. For full blocks, will connect to any color. For cable blocks, will only connect to the same color or to the default color (gray).
item.refinedstorage.security_card.unboun: Right click to configure and bind to the current player.
Right click to configure. Use while crouching to clear configuration and binding.
item.refinedstorage.fallback_security_ca: Acts as a fallback if no matching Security Card for a player is found. Right click to configure. Use while crouching to clear configuration.
item.refinedstorage.portable_grid.help: Allows to interact with a storage disk while not being connected to a storage network. Can be used as a block in world, or from your inventory.
item.refinedstorage.storage_monitor.help: A block that displays the current amount of a certain resource in your storage network. SHIFT + right click to configure. Left click to extract a stack, SHIFT + left click to extract a single resource, right click to insert a resource, right click multiple times to insert resources in bulk.
item.refinedstorage.pattern.help: Used in autocrafting to store the recipe to be crafted. Use while crouching to clear.
Allows managing all your autocrafters from a single interface.
item.refinedstorage.autocrafting_monitor: Displays the status of autocrafting tasks and allows you to cancel autocrafting tasks in your storage network.
misc.refinedstorage.no_permission.insert: You are not allowed to insert.
misc.refinedstorage.no_permission.extrac: You are not allowed to extract.
You are not allowed to place a %s here.
You are not allowed to break the %s.
You are not allowed to rotate the %s.
You are not allowed to dismantle the %s.
key.refinedstorage.clear_crafting_grid_m: Clear Crafting Grid matrix to network
Clear Crafting Grid matrix to inventory
permission.refinedstorage.insert.descrip: Whether the player can insert resources in a network.
permission.refinedstorage.extract.descri: Whether the player can extract resources from a network.
permission.refinedstorage.autocrafting.d: Whether the player can start, cancel or view an autocrafting task.
permission.refinedstorage.open.descripti: Whether the player can open network device GUIs.
permission.refinedstorage.build.descript: Whether the player can add or remove network devices.
permission.refinedstorage.security.descr: Whether the player can manage the security options for a network.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.title: Refined Storage Configuration
refinedstorage.configuration.title: Refined Storage Configuration
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.sm: Whether scrollbars should use smooth scrolling.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ma: Максимальна кількість рядків при розтягуванні екрана
Максимальна кількість рядків, яка може бути зображена при розтягуванні екрана.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.se: Whether the search box should be auto-selected.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.au: Whether a notification should be shown when an autocrafting task is finished.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.gr: Whether the Grid should use a large font for quantities.
Prevent sorting while SHIFT is down
Whether the Grid should avoid sorting when shift is held down.
Whether the Grid should show a detailed tooltip.
Whether the search query should persist when closing and re-opening the Grid.
The energy used by the Grid.
The synchronization type of the Grid search box.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.cr: What should happen to the crafting matrix slots when closing the Crafting Grid.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.co: The energy capacity of the Controller.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.di: The energy used by the Disk Drive.
The energy used by the Disk Interface.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.st: Енергія, яку використовує творчий блок сховища.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.fl: Configuration for the Fluid Storage Blocks.
The energy used by the 64B Fluid Storage Block.
The energy used by the 256B Fluid Storage Block.
The energy used by the 1024B Fluid Storage Block.
The energy used by the 4096B Fluid Storage Block.
Енергія, яку використовує творчий блок сховища рідин.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.up: Додаткова енергія, що витрачається на кожне поліпшення швидкості.
Додаткова енергія, що витрачається на кожне поліпшення стосу.
The additional energy used by the Fortune 1 Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Fortune 2 Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Fortune 3 Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Silk Touch Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Regulator Upgrade.
The additional energy used per Range Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Creative Range Upgrade.
The additional range provided by the Range Upgrade.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.if: The energy used by the Interface.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ex: The energy used by the External Storage.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.wi: The energy capacity of the Wireless Grid.
The energy used by the Wireless Grid to open.
The energy used by the Wireless Grid to insert resources.
The energy used by the Wireless Grid to extract resources.
The energy used by the Wireless Transmitter.
The base range of the Wireless Transmitter.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.st: The energy used by the Storage Monitor.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ne: The energy used by the Network Receiver.
The energy used by the Network Transmitter.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.po: The energy capacity of the Portable Grid.
The energy used by the Portable Grid to open.
The energy used by the Portable Grid to insert resources.
The energy used by the Portable Grid to extract resources.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.se: The energy used by the Security Card.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.fa: Configuration for the Fallback Security Card.
The energy used by the Fallback Security Card.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.se: The energy used by the Security Manager.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.re: Output network energy usage (if not in pass through mode)
Output network energy usage (if not in pass through mode).
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.au: The energy used by the Autocrafter.
The additional energy used per pattern.
The energy used by the Autocrafter Manager.
The energy used by the Autocrafting Monitor.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.wi: Configuration for the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor.
The energy capacity of the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor.
The energy used by the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor to open.
The energy used by the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor to cancel a task.
The energy used by the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor to cancel all tasks.
advancements.refinedstorage.root.descrip: Використовуйте один або кілька контролерів у мережі сховища, щоб забезпечити мережу енергією
advancements.refinedstorage.connecting.d: Використовуйте кабель для з'єднання пристроїв між собою або розміщення пристроїв один біля одного
advancements.refinedstorage.drives.descr: Створіть дисковод, щоб мати змогу зберігати диски сховища
advancements.refinedstorage.interfacing_: Створіть дисковий інтерфейс для передачі ресурсів між мережею сховища та дисками сховища
advancements.refinedstorage.storing_item: Створіть диск сховища і вставте його у дисковод
advancements.refinedstorage.viewing_your: Створіть сітку для взаємодії з вашим сховищем
advancements.refinedstorage.upgrading_yo: Покращуйте сітку до майструвальної, щоб отримати можливість майструвати
advancements.refinedstorage.storing_flui: Craft a Fluid Storage Disk and put it in your Disk Drive
advancements.refinedstorage.importing.de: Get resources into the storage network with an Importer
advancements.refinedstorage.exporting.de: Get resources out of the storage network with an Exporter
advancements.refinedstorage.upgrading.de: Створіть поліпшення для покращення різних пристроїв
advancements.refinedstorage.interface_to: Експортуйте та імпортуйте елементи одночасно за допомогою інтерфейсу
advancements.refinedstorage.storing_exte: Використовуйте зовнішнє сховище, щоб забезпечити мережу сховищем із зовнішнього блоку, наприклад, скрині
advancements.refinedstorage.detecting.de: Використовуйте редстоун для перевірки ресурсів, що зберігаються в мережі сховища
advancements.refinedstorage.construction: Отримуйте блоки з мережі сховища у світ за допомогою Конструктора
Отримуйте блоки зі світу в мережу сховища за допомогою деструктора
advancements.refinedstorage.wireless.des: Бездротовий доступ до ресурсів за допомогою бездротової сітки
advancements.refinedstorage.better_than_: Створіть монітор сховища, щоб переглядати, вставляти або витягувати ресурси з мережі сховища
advancements.refinedstorage.no_cables_re: Додайте додаткові компоненти до вашої мережі зберігання даних без використання кабелів за допомогою мережевого передавача, мережевого приймача та мережевої карти
advancements.refinedstorage.portable_sto: Створіть портативну сітку для доступу до вмісту дисків без використання мережі сховища
advancements.refinedstorage.security.des: Захистіть ваше сховище за допомогою менеджера безпеки та картки безпеки
advancements.refinedstorage.conditional_: Вмикайте та вимикайте цілі секції мережі сховища та створюйте нові відгалуження мережі за допомогою реле
advancements.refinedstorage.autocrafting: Автоматизуйте створення за допомогою автомайструвальника, використовуючи шаблони, створені в сітці шаблонів
advancements.refinedstorage.managing_pat: Створіть менеджер автомайструвальника, щоб керувати шаблонами в централізованому інтерфейсі
advancements.refinedstorage.monitoring.d: Check the status of your autocrafting tasks with a Autocrafting Monitor
advancements.refinedstorage.wireless_mon: Check the status of your autocrafting tasks wirelessly with a Wireless Autocrafting Monitor
